entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
